If you reach this, you obviously tap the 'how to use' button on the splash screen. Who reads manuals anyway? Anyhow, here is a quick tour of how to use raTags. 
 
 On the top left corner of the screen, you will see a three-lined button. It looks like a hamburger, hence the name, where you can select what you wanna do with our app. 

 Categories button to view the eight categories: Tourist Spots, Food Spots, Coffee and Milk Tea shops, Amusement Spots, Hotels, Banks, Hospitals, and Government Offices. 

 About us to learn more about this beautiful app's handsome and skillful developers. 

 Select the 'how to use' button to pretend you don't know how to use such an app.

 About Tagaytay to know more about the cold city of Tagaytay.


To select a specific establishment, one should choose a category and then select or search for the preferred one.


Oh, and we also have a unique feature. A price filtering feature that lets you choose your budget and all establishments that fit your preferred budget will be displayed. You can bypass this step and just go directly to the preferred one if you're rich enough for any establishment or you just don't care about the price.


Once selected, you will see the establishment's photo and information, such as its name, contact, and address. Once the go button is tapped, the weather information, route, and line that separates you from the establishment will be displayed. One must tap the directions button and select your preferred navigation app to see the direction. 


There are also suggested nearby establishments on the map and featured establishments hand-picked by our hardworking developers.


And lastly, to end the trip, tap the end the trip button to be redirected to the category page if one wants to start another trip.
